SENT.plain: Brain scans were abnormal in 2 of 6 patients with cerebral "Moyamoya" disease
The spatial and temporal scan patterns were analogous to those described in conventional cerebral infarction
Cerebral infarction due to emboli resulting from mural thrombi may explain the uptake of radioisotope
None of the scans was abnormal in 4 adult patients in which the disease was complicated by subarachnoid hemorrhage
